      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PartitionInfo PartitionInfo.setInSyncReplicas(List<Node> inSyncReplicas)
      Set the subset of the replicas that are in sync
      PartitionInfo PartitionInfo.setLeader(Node leader)
      Set the node id of the node currently acting as a leader
      PartitionInfo PartitionInfo.setPartition(int partition)
      Set the partition id
      PartitionInfo PartitionInfo.setReplicas(List<Node> replicas)
      Set the complete set of replicas for this partition
      PartitionInfo PartitionInfo.setTopic(String topic)
      Set the topic name
